title: #116: Southern Gentleman's Kitchen With Matt Moore
description: If you've read the site for awhile, than you're likely familiar with Matt Moore-- AoM's resident chef. Matt recently published a book with Southern Living magazine entitled The Southern Gentleman's Kitchen. Today on the podcast I talk to Matt about cooking, chivalry, boar hunting, entreprenuership, and how to cook the perfect steak.
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
